# setColorAttachmentMap(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the mapping from logical shader color output to physical render pass color attachments.

## Declaration

```swift
func setColorAttachmentMap(_ mapping: MTLLogicalToPhysicalColorAttachmentMap?)
```

## Parameters

- **mapping**: Mapping from logical shader outputs to physical outputs.

## Discussion

Use this method to define how the physical color attachments you specify via [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPassDescriptor/colorAttachments] map to the logical color output the fragment shader writes to.

To use this feature, make sure to set [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPassDescriptor/supportColorAttachmentMapping] to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Configuring blend behavior

- **setBlendColor(red:green:blue:alpha:)**: Configures each pixel component value, including alpha, for the render pipeline’s constant blend color.
